title: Our buggy moral code
description: Behavioral economist Dan Ariely studies the bugs in our moral code: the hidden reasons we think it's OK to cheat or steal (sometimes). Clever studies help make his point that we're predictably irrational -- and can be influenced in ways we can't grasp.
author: Dan Ariely
keywords: TED, talks, brain, culture, economics, evil, motivation, psychology, science, self, society
